name: Letters To Mom
description:
You've written a sweet letter to your mom and just as you've put it in the mailbox it gets blown away by a passing car. Make your way back with the help of the breeze as you spread motherly love to all you meet across your journey.

Controls:

  • A/Left Arrow Key - Move Left/Up
  • D/Right Arrow Key - Move Right/Up
  • S/Down Arrow Key - Move Down
  • ESC - Skip Cut-scene

Theme: The theme was connections so we went for the connection between you and your mom, and how it connects us all. 

Made for College Game Jam
